appetizers.name: Cheese Bread
appetizers.description: Stringy cheese bread served from the oven.

appetizers.name: Chips N' Dip
appetizers.ingredients: Tortilla Chips, Sour Cream Chip Dip
appetizers.description: Tortilla Chips, and sour dip to add the flavor.

coldSandwiches.name: Cold Turkey Sandwich
coldSandwiches.description: Cold turkey sandwich served upon normal bread with mayonaise spread upon cheese.

coldSandwiches.name: Ham Sandwich
coldSandwiches.description: Cold ham served with normal bread, mayonaise and cheese forming the sandwich.

hotSandwiches.name: Hot Ham and Cheese Sandwich
hotSandwiches.description: Hot Ham and Cheese Sandwich served on normal bread.

hotSandwiches.name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
hotSandwiches.description: Grilled Sandwich served on toasted bread.

desserts.name: Cookie
desserts.description: Hot cookie served straight from the oven, delicious when served with milk.

desserts.name: Chocolate Ice Cream
desserts.description: Hot cookie served straight from the oven, delicious when served with milk.

drinks.name: Mountain Dew
drinks.description: Carbonated soft drink called Mountain Dew served within a 8oz. cup. Comes with a straw.

drinks.description: Carbonated soft drink called Pepsi served within a 8oz. cup. Comes with a straw.
